SELECT gold FROM tb_member_wallet WHERE mem_no = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj WHERE mem_no = #{value} -- AND state = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj WHERE mem_phone = #{value} AND state = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m')
SELECT `level` , grade , ruby AS dal , gold AS byeol FROM tbl_level_exp WHERE `level` > 0 ORDER BY `level` ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_member_notification WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no} AND read_yn = '0'

/* Mypage.xml - selectSpecialDjBroadcastCnt */ select count(*) from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room where mem_no = #{mem_no} and 3600 <= airtime and DATE_FORMAT(concat(#{condition_start_date}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= start_date and start_date <= DATE_FORMAT(concat(#{condition_end_date}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

/* Mypage.xml - selectSpecialDjReqManage */ select idx , title , select_year , select_month , date_format(req_start_date, '%Y%m%d000000') req_start_date , date_format(req_end_date, '%Y%m%d235959') req_end_date , date_format(condition_start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') condition_start_date , date_format(condition_end_date, '%Y.%m.%d') condition_end_date , condition_code1 , condition_data1 , condition_code2 , condition_data2 , condition_code3 , condition_data3 , pc_image_url , mobile_image_url , is_view , platform , reg_date , op_name , last_upd_date , last_op_name from rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj_manage where select_year = #{select_year} and select_month = #{select_month}
/* Mypage.xml - selectMemberLevel */ select mem_no , `level` , grade , exp , last_upd_date from rd_data.tb_member_level where mem_no = #{mem_no}
call sp_member_broadcast_shortcut_add(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call sp_member_broadcast_shortcut_extend(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call sp_broadcast_msg_click_update(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT admin_badge FROM tb_member_profile WHERE mem_no = #{value} UNION ALL SELECT 0 ) AS a ORDER BY admin_badge DESC LIMIT 1
call sp_member_notification_delete(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT (CASE WHEN #{myMemNo} = #{targetMemNo} THEN (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_member_fanboard WHERE mem_no = #{myMemNo} AND STATUS <> 2 AND idx > #{fanBoard} AND DATEDIFF(now(), last_upd_date ) <= 7) ELSE (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_member_fanboard WHERE mem_no = #{targetMemNo} AND STATUS <> 2 AND DATEDIFF(now(), last_upd_date ) <= 7) END) AS fanBoard, (CASE WHEN #{myMemNo} = #{targetMemNo} THEN FALSE ELSE (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_member_broadcast_notice WHERE mem_no = #{targetMemNo} AND DATEDIFF(now(), last_upd_date ) <= 7) END)AS broadNotice, (CASE WHEN #{myMemNo} = #{targetMemNo} THEN (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_member_wallet_ruby WHERE mem_no = #{myMemNo} AND idx > #{dal} AND `type` IN (5, 7, 10, 11, 12, 22, 23) AND ruby > 0) ELSE FALSE END) AS dal, (CASE WHEN #{myMemNo} = #{targetMemNo} THEN (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_member_wallet_gold WHERE mem_no = #{myMemNo} and idx > #{byeol} AND `type` IN (2, 4, 6, 21, 22, 23) AND gold > 0) ELSE FALSE END) AS byeol,
(SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_service_center_notice WHERE view_on = 1 AND DATEDIFF(now(), last_upd_date ) <= 7)
(SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_service_center_notice WHERE view_on = 1 AND DATEDIFF(now(), last_upd_date ) <= 7 AND idx NOT IN (${notice}))
AS notice, (CASE WHEN #{myMemNo} = #{targetMemNo} THEN
(SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_service_center_qna_v25 WHERE mem_no = #{myMemNo} AND state = 1 AND DATEDIFF(now(), op_date ) <= 7)
(SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) FROM tb_service_center_qna_v25 WHERE mem_no = #{myMemNo} AND state = 1 AND DATEDIFF(now(), op_date ) <= 7 AND idx NOT IN (CONCAT('', ${qna})))
ELSE FALSE END) AS qna
SELECT MAX(idx) as fanBoard FROM tb_member_fanboard WHERE mem_no = ${value} AND STATUS <> 2

SELECT (SELECT MAX(idx) FROM tb_member_wallet_ruby WHERE mem_no = ${value} AND `type` IN (5, 7, 10, 11, 12, 22, 23) AND ruby > 0) AS dal, (SELECT MAX(idx) FROM tb_member_wallet_gold WHERE mem_no = ${value} AND `type` IN (2, 4, 6, 21, 22, 23) AND gold > 0) AS byeol
